query: Can you assist with creating a 5-day travel plan for two people? We will be departing from Miami and wish to visit 2 cities in North Carolina from March 9th to March 13th, 2022. Our budget is set at $3,900, and we require accommodations that offer entire rooms.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Asheville,Charlotte]
